Synopsis: The mystery man behind the dastardly deeds of Mr. Dapper finally revealed in this shocking episode of the Goon!
For the hardcore collectors out there, Albatross offers a special limited edition card stock cover of THE GOON #8 with art by Goon and Tank Girl artist Brett Parson!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Eric Powell | 1 | Var | Cardstock Variant Cover | Brett Parson | 2 |
